name: Bunny Go!
description:
Short (and hopefully addicting) mobile game about a bunny that is always hungry. It is currently under development and it is meant for a Marketing class. Might be published for class purposes, who knows.

Armando Agra - Programmer, Game Designer

Raquel Avelino - 2D Art, concept arts, Game Designer

Iago Lunardy - 3D Art, animation, Game Designer

Jocelmo Gomes - Game Designer, Sound
